alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 1:08PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Wakulla, southeastern Liberty and north central Franklin Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 108 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Crawfordville to 22 miles northeast of Eastpoint to 7 miles northwest of Carrabelle. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crawfordville, Sopchoppy, Morgan Place, Buckhorn, Arran, Mcintyre, Sanborn and Curtis Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
